sub_title: harshsanghvi.net | HEC Paris | IIMC | PMP | MSP (P) | Prince2 Agile (P) | CSM | CSPO | ITIL Expert
summary:
► The Real Me:

I strongly believe in the philosophy of 'Being Happy' to reap of all the benefits of Life, Work & Learning which simply starts with having Smile on the face and determination to be happy in any situation. These days, for the most part of my time, I tell the Happiness story and how one can be happy and increase productivity in work, love in family, effectiveness in learning, collectively manifest to Growth & Success.

Spending parts of my life in different geographies (North America, South Asia, West Europe) has shaped me into a culturally sensitive and inquisitive person. I strive to remain authentic, aware and updated while maintaining a good attitude.


► The Deemed Proficient:

Certified MSP®Pactitioner, PMP®, CSPO®, CSM®, Prince2® Agile Practitioner and ITIL® Expert

A management thought leader and story teller with over 14+ years of proven experience in strategic portfolio, program and project management in Product & Engineering Management in the space of ITeS / Internet / Online Payments / Ecommerce / Blockchain / e-learning / AI / RPA.

With proven capabilities and expertise in Strategic Management 'in Action' and hands-on experience to develop and manage online transaction systems, have evolved as a cutting edge talent of transforming business, processes and products. Being a trainer and coach, developed and mentored teams for measurable growth and success!

People often refer and recommend me as:

Full Stack Product Management Professional
UX & CX Design Thinker
HCI Strategist
Responsible Leader
Engineering Management Expert
Result / Outcome Focused Business Leader
Agile Master
Program Management Specialist
Chief Coach and Mentor
Start-up Expert
Change Enthusiast
Business Transformation Advisor
Growth Strategist

Always rated as top performer for being data driven, design focused and customer centric. Have passion for management and technology. Career interest in building successful teams, organizations and startups, taking up executive roles in reputed IT companies where the work is intellectually challenging and good performance is financially rewarding.

projects.title: E-Dirham Mobile Purse - Government of UAE (GCC)
projects.description:
E-Dirham is a payment tool introduced by government of United Arab Emirates launched on 3rd February 2001, becoming first nation in Arab region to introduce such a system countrywide.

Payment Channels Include: PoS, Over the Internet, E-stamp

With the vision to increase more channels and methods of payment through E-dirham resulted to the idea of e-dirham mobile purse with e-dirham being mother wallet unlike to PPI in India.

The mother wallet will be loaded with the e-dirham government client card(second generation), both will be used by individuals and organizations.

Card holder has to load the card going nearby e-dirham member bank and then load the mother mobile wallet with the card.

volunteer_experiences.description: Participated and engaged other citizens to contribute their some time & money for the betterment of differently able souls.
Educated others about the Leprosy Eradication Drive 2001-2002 and motivated many to be responsible citizens.
Supervised, assisted and participated in many of the activities performed by participants of age group 8-12 years for the environmental issues like soil erosion & global warming.

Brihan Mumbai Mahanagar Palika, Govt. Of Maharashtra, India

Served as a non-paid servant to Government of Maharashtra, India. with full faith in social service. Initiated, participated, installed, supervised the AIDS Eradication Program at the youth execution level under senior supervision of Muncipal Councillor Mr. Upendra Doshi (ward no.: 167)
Objectives of the drive:
- Educating about sexually transmitted diseases(STD)
- Installations of Easy-to-buy condom vending machines
- Camp at areas affected/prone to sexual abuse/crime.
Served as non-paid helper at NIC, Maharashtra Centre for their e-governance projects.
